attributes.action: review the intelligence needed for a full scale breach of a persons home by armed officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the prime minister or government to review the intelligence needed for a full scale armed response at a persons home/motor vehicle.after all not all intelligence is reliable or up to date (in regards to motor vehicles)so to treat all intelligence as a means for a full scale breach of a home/motor vehicle is outrageous.the prime minister and the courts should work towards setting levels to the response armed officers give.the levels should depend upon the character and background information of the accused and the intelligence provider should have proof for his/her allegations.surely hear say or assumptions should never be good enough grounds for a full scale breach by armed officers on a persons home/motor vehicle.
